caller_intent: Anna is seeking to finalize a commercial auto policy to obtain a DMV tag, requiring policy details and adjustments to coverage limits and payment terms.
resolution_steps: Agent Lauren Ware confirms Anna's account transition from Rent Care Solutions to Carolinas Alliance for Residential.
Discusses current policy details, including coverage limits (2M vs. 1M) and driver information.
Proposes payment options (down payment + monthly installments) and automatic payment setup.
Identifies a system issue blocking policy issuance due to company name discrepancies with Carolinas Alliance.
Plans to consult with a manager to resolve the policy blockage and will call back with updates.
knowledge_required: Carrier-specific policy rules (Carolinas Alliance for Residential)
summary: Anna is working to finalize a commercial auto policy with Carolinas Alliance for Residential, requiring policy details for DMV tag processing. The agent is addressing coverage limit adjustments, payment terms, and a system issue blocking policy issuance due to company name discrepancies. The agent will consult with a manager and call back with updates.
